i1.name: Absolution
description: {{sbc|Innate - Weakened Soul}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks [[on-hit]] and damaging abilities on enemy champions apply {{as|Mist}} for 4 seconds, refreshed to {{fd|0.75}} seconds if '''Senna''' starts winding up a basic attack on them. If '''Senna''' applies {{as|Mist}} to the same target twice, she collects it, dealing {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|11|1;2;3;4;5;6;8;10;12;14;16|key=%}} of target's '''current''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and making the target immune to further {{as|Mist}} applications for a few seconds.

Enemy units that die near '''Senna''' have a chance to spawn a ''Mist Wraith'' for 8 seconds, increased to 2 ''Mist Wraiths'' for epic monsters. '''Senna''' can basic attack a ''Mist Wraith'' to destroy it, gaining {{g|3}} and collecting its {{as|Mist}}.
* Enemy {{tip|champions}}, large and epic {{tip|monsters}} are guaranteed.
* {{tip|Minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' kills have a {{fd|4.166}}% chance.
* Large {{tip|minions}} that '''Senna''' doesn't kill are guaranteed, while lesser {{tip|minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' doesn't kill have a 22% chance.

{{sbc|Innate - Absolution}}: Each stack of {{as|Mist}} grants '''Senna''' {{sti|attack damage|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' attack damage}}}}. For every 20 stacks, '''Senna''' also gains {{sti|attack range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and {{sti|critical strike chance|{{as|15% critical strike chance}}}}. Upon exceeding {{as|100% critical strike chance}}, '''Senna''' converts 35% of the excess into {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Relic Cannon}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks deal {{as|20% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and grant {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|key=%|showtype=false|10 to 20|1;6;10}} of the target's movement speed}} as {{sti|movement speed|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds on-hit.
i1.notes:
* Despite '''Senna''' dealing 1 damage to ''Mist Wraiths'', attacking them will calculate the {{as|attack's damage|AD}} (including {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers) and any [[on-hit]] effects for the purposes of {{stil|life steal}} and {{tip|drain}} effects.
** Since '''Senna''' is '''not''' dealing more than 1 damage, effects such as {{iis |Wit's End}} passive will not trigger.
* {{tip|Dodge}} prevents from marking and collecting a ''Mist'' via '''Senna's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Q|Senna}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Mist'' interaction with {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} spawn a wraith each.
* Enemies will not see newly spawned wraiths while '''Senna''' is not visible.
* {{tip|Minion|Minions}} executed by allies with {{nie|Spoils of War}} have a {{fd|8.33}}% chance to spawn wraiths.
* A wraith can be hit by {{ai|Cosmic Binding|Bard}} and it will interact with it the same way minions or monsters interact with Cosmic Binding but it will not take damage.
* ''Mist Wraith'' has a spawn animation, but is targetable immediately.
* ''Mist Wraith'' grants a small amount of {{tip|sight}} around itself.
* {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} secondary bolts will ignore ''Mist Wraiths''.
* {{tt|Excluding|Due to lack of available metric}} the range increase, one stack of ''Mist'' values approx. {{g|{{fd|40.5}}}} ({{g|+3}} from ''Mist Wraith'' pickup). The bonuses have a gross value of {{g|{{fd|56.25}}}} ({{g|{{fd|35.25}}}} with life steal).
** {{sti|{{as|{{fd|0.75 AD}}}}}} is worth {{g|26.25‬}}. ''Absolution'' effectively boosts basic attacks with {{as|{{fd|0.9 AD}}}}, making the value {{g|31.5}}.
** {{sti|critical chance|{{fd|0.75%}}}} [[Critical_strike#Critical_strike_chance|critical strike chance]] is worth {{g|30}}. ''Absolution'' reduces its efficiency by 70%, making the value {{g|9}}.
*** {{sti|life steal|{{fd|0.26%}}}} [[life steal]] is worth ≈{{g|9}}.

q1.name: Piercing Darkness
q1.target_range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{passive progression/deprecated version|21|600 to 1100|type=[[File:Absolution.png|20px|link=]] Mist|0 to 400}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, {{tip|heal|healing}} herself and allied {{tip|champions}} in a line, and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a thinner line.

Upon being struck, enemy {{tip|turrets}}, {{tip|wards}}, [[jungle plants]], [[File: MistWraithSquare.png|20px|link=Senna#Absolution]] [[Senna#Absolution|Mist Wraiths]] and [[Champion_summoned_units#Targetable|any other attack-interactive units]] are {{tt|''considered'' basic attacked once|Piercing Darkness doesn't actually apply basic damage}}, while {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|turrets}} take {{tip|on-hit|on-hit effects}} (with all turret-specific rules applied).
Basic attacks reduce ''Piercing Darkness' '' {{sti|cooldown}} by 1 second [[on-hit]].
leveling:
{{st|Healing|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|40 to 160}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Piercing Darkness' '' cast time scales linearily with '''Senna's''' champion level and scales non-linearily with her {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} (beyond her per-level attack speed).
* '''Senna''' can generally target anything that is not either explicitly {{tip|untargetable}} or herself.
** Valid targets include anything that can be targeted by a basic attack from someone.
* ''Piercing Darkness'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).
** It leads by (up-to?) 80 units.
* On-hit effects are applied in order of struck units' spawn IDs. This matters for effects that are consumed on-hit (e.g. {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}, {{nie|Spellblade}}), which are applied to the target with the lowest {{tt|Spawn ID|among champions, this would also be the enemy first pick in Blind Pick mode}}.
** "Spawn ID" is an unofficial abbreviation to describe the spawn order for all units at the beginning of games, below are some examples.
** If '''Senna''' targets an enemy champion but hits at least one more enemy champion simultaneously, {{ris|Press the Attack}} first stack will be applied to that target. If no champion was targeted, it will default to the champion with the lowest Spawn ID out of the ones struck by the ability. Whether the effect stacks up on a champion or not when multiple enemy champions are stuck also depends on Spawn ID.
** If ''Piercing Darkness'' struck an enemy champion and turret simultaneously, with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} fully charged, the passive effect will most likely proc on the turret since towers are often spawned before champions.
* Since ''Piercing Darkness'' is treated as a basic attack to {{tip|turret|turrets}}, its damage is valid for the [[Turret#Damaging_turrets|damage conversion]] from {{as|physical|physical damage}} to {{as|magic|magic damage}} when attacking them.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent on-hit effects from being applied.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Piercing Darkness'' interaction with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

w1.name: Last Embrace
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and sticking onto the first enemy hit for 1 second.
After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, {{tip|root|rooting}} them and nearby enemies for a few seconds.
w1.notes:
* ''Last Embrace'' will not {{tip|root}} the primary target if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Last Embrace'' will cast from wherever '''Senna''' is at the end of the cast time.

e1.name: Curse of the Black Mist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' surrounds herself with an [[aura]] of mist and gains {{tip|camouflage}} for a duration. If '''Senna''' {{tt|breaks the camouflage|Attacking, casting abilities, etc}}, she regains it after {{fd|1.75}} seconds of not performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking stealth|break stealth]].
Allied champions who enter the mist gain ''Wraith Form'' for a duration equal to the remaining duration.

{{sbc|Wraith Form:}} Gain {{tip|camouflage}}. Enemies will have {{tip|obscured vision}} of ''Wraiths'' moving outside of the mist. ''Wraith Form'' can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after {{fd|1.75}} seconds of not performing actions that break stealth. ''Wraith Form'' ends immediately upon '''Senna's''' {{tip|death}}.
'''Senna''' and allies camouflaged by ''Curse of the Black Mist'' also gain {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
e1.notes:
* '''Senna''' can move while casting.
* Allies affected by the ''Curse of the Blast Mist'' aura receive a buff called ''Cloak of Mist''.
* Obscured units appear as ''Wraiths'', hence the name. The wraith model does not distinguish which champion is obscured.
** On the [[Map (League of Legends)|mini-map]], obscured champions will be displayed as wraith icons instead of champion icons to the enemy team.
* In-game, the 'Cloak of Mist' buff grants camouflage and the 'Wraith Form' buff obscures the unit and grants movement speed. However, 'Cloak of Mist' has the unspecified effect of negating the obscuring effects of 'Wraith Form' (i.e. the unit is not a wraith while inside the mist); the unit has the bonus movement speed even when they are not a wraith (e.g. inside the mist or an enemy is nearby); and 'Wraith Form' also grants the functionality of camouflage (i.e. the unit is treated as a camouflaged unit with regards to {{tip|True Sight}}, {{ii|Control Ward|Control Wards}}, and enemy {{tip|champions}}).
** Given this overly complex interaction between the two buffs granted as well as the overlapping effects, it is easier to describe the effects as a single buff that is modified in specific circumstances rather than trying to establish a new game mechanic.
** '''Senna''' likewise has her aura buff and the 'Wraith Form' buff, but her 'Wraith Form' does not share gameplay functionality with other allies benefiting from Wraith Form. For '''Senna''', the appearance of being a wraith is a form-swap while camouflaged (similar to {{cai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}}). '''Senna''' will remain in her wraith form when she is detected so long as the camouflage effect isn't broken, and her wraith's appearance is very distinct from other wraiths.
* {{ii|Oracle's Extract}} has no effect on champions with the ''Cloak of Mist'' buff, even though Oracle's Extract has a range of 500, while the camouflage detection radius is only 400.
* Allied champions who enter the mist and have {{tip|stealth}} of their own will still gain the ''Wraith Form'' buff but they will not grant {{tip|obscured vision}} of themselves to the enemy while out of the mist nor will they appear as a ''Wraith''.
** Allies who have their own {{tip|camouflage}} and also have ''Wraith Form'' will be revealed to enemies from their stealth's detection range, not ''Wraith Form's''.
* ''Curse of the Black Mist'' will not activate if '''Senna''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time.
* ''Wraith Form'' will not be granted to allies that are in a {{tip|zombie state}} or are {{tip|channel|channeling}}. It will be granted to allies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.

r1.name: Dawning Shadow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' {{tip|sight|reveals}} herself before firing two beams of spectral light in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area briefly along its path. The center beam deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit.
The broad beam {{tip|shields}} '''Senna''' and allied champions hit for 3 seconds.
r1.notes: * '''Senna''' will always fire from the original casting position.
